-- -1: starting hand, 0: select phase. Otherwise, index of selectedPhases
currentPhase = -1
gameStarted = false
selectedPhases = {}
-- holds information based on phase
phasePowerSnapshot = {["Yellow"] = {}, ["Red"] = {}, ["Blue"] = {}, ["Green"] = {}}
handCountSnapshot = {0,0,0,0}
-- nil if no choice was made, otherwise GUID of selected object
playerChoiceState = {nil,nil,nil,nil}

gameEndMessage = false

disableInteract_GUID = {"082406", "3e3772", "a5737a", "2c39a5","b44250", "7552ef", "5c95f7", "74c6f0","63866b", "3a5272", "8dbdb4", "821f8e",
     "3f1c4d", "bcf758", "a22fe5", "b4aab3"}

playerColorIndexMap = {["Yellow"] = 1, ["Red"] = 2, ["Blue"] = 3, ["Green"] = 4}

     ["NOVELTY"] = color(0.345, 0.709, 0.974),
     ["RARE"] = color(0.709, 0.407, 0.129),
     ["GENE"] = color(0.278, 0.760, 0.141),
     ["ALIEN"] = color(0.933, 0.909, 0.105),

     {"842722", {2.24, 1.68, -5.60}},
     {"6c0780", {4.48, 1.68, -5.60}},
}

phaseText = {"Phase I: Explore", "Phase II: Develop", "Phase III: Settle", "Phase IV: Consume", "Phase V: Produce"}

drawZone_GUID = "32297e"
discardZone_GUID = "fe5c37"

activePhaseTiles_GUID = {"e536e3", "34d2e8", "8df356", "842722", "6c0780"}

phaseCardNames = {"Explore (+5)", "Explore (+1,+1)", "Develop", "Settle", "Consume ($)", "Consume (x2)", "Produce"}
readyTokens_GUID = {"8f6042", "6ed6bc", "169b57", "718265"}
smallReadyTokens_GUID = {"dd182c", "ab5795", "37d9aa", "476374"}
twoPlayerAdvancedMode = false

helpDisplay_GUID = {"f9c4ee", "5a39e2", "515d9a", "1dbea0"}

goodsSnapPointOffset = {-0.6, 0.1, 0.4}

actionCardPowers = {
     ["Explore (+5)"] = {
          powers = {["1"] = {
               ["DRAW"] = {codes = {}, strength = 5, times = 0}
          }}
     },
     ["Explore (+1,+1)"] = {
          powers = {["1"] = {
               ["DRAW"] = {codes = {}, strength = 1, times = 0},

     },

               ["DRAW_AFTER"] = {codes = {}, strength = 1, times = 0}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = {}
    saved_data.gameStarted = gameStarted
    saved_data.currentPhase = currentPhase
    saved_data.selectedPhases = selectedPhases
    saved_data.drawDeck_GUID = drawDeck_GUID
    saved_data.handCountSnapshot = handCountSnapshot
    saved_data.playerChoiceState = playerChoiceState
    return JSON.encode(saved_data)
end

function onload(saved_data)
     componentsBag = getObjectFromGUID("4c1650")
     cardData = loadData(componentsBag.getVar("cardtxt"))

     if saved_data ~= "" then
          local data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
          gameStarted = data.gameStarted
          currentPhase = data.currentPhase
          selectedPhases = data.selectedPhases
          drawDeck_GUID = data.drawDeck_GUID
          handCountSnapshot = data.handCountSnapshot
          playerChoiceState = data.playerChoiceState
     end

     drawDeck = getObjectFromGUID(drawDeck_GUID)

     for i=1, #disableInteract_GUID do
          local obj = getObjectFromGUID(disableInteract_GUID[i])
          --obj.interactable = false
     end

     handZoneMap = {}
     for i=1, #handZone_GUID do
          handZoneMap[handZone_GUID[i]] = true
     end

     tableauZoneMap = {}
     for i=1, #tableauZone_GUID do
          tableauZoneMap[tableauZone_GUID[i]] = true
     end

     drawZone = getObjectFromGUID(drawZone_GUID)
     discardZone = getObjectFromGUID(discardZone_GUID)

     for color, index in pairs(playerColorIndexMap) do
          local o = getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[index])
          if o then
               o.setVar("player", color)
          end

          o = getObjectFromGUID(smallReadyTokens_GUID[index])
          if o then
               o.setVar("player", color)
          end
          updateHandCardState(color)
          powersSnapshot(color, tostring(selectedPhases[currentPhase]))
     end

     updateHelpTextAll()
     updatePhaseTilesHighlight()
end

function loadData(data)
     local tbl = {}
     local cardInfo = {}

     for line in magiclines(data) do

          -- skip comments
          if line:sub(1, 1) == "#" or line:len() <= 0 then
               goto endloop
          end

          do
               local code = line:sub(1,1)

               -- new card
               if code == "N" then
                    cardInfo = {}
                    cardInfo.name = line:sub(3, line:len())
                    cardInfo.powers = {}
                    cardInfo.flags = {}
                    tbl[cardInfo.name] = cardInfo
               -- card type (world or development), cost, and vp
               elseif code == "T" then
                    local tokens = split(line, ":")
                    cardInfo.type = tonumber(tokens[2])
                    cardInfo.cost = tonumber(tokens[3])
                    cardInfo.vp = tonumber(tokens[4])
               -- expansion (need only the first value)
               elseif code == "E" then
                    cardInfo.expansion = line:sub(3,3)
               -- flags
               elseif code == "F" then
                    local tokens = split(all_trim(line:sub(3, line:len())),"|")
                    local flags = {}
                    for i=1, #tokens do
                         flags[tokens[i]] = true
                    end
                    cardInfo.flags = flags
               -- goodtype
               elseif code == "G" then
                    cardInfo.goods = line:sub(3, line:len())
               -- powers
               elseif code == "P" then
                    local tokens = split(line,":")
                    local power = {}
                    power.codes = split(all_trim(tokens[3]),"|")
                    power.strength = tonumber(tokens[4])
                    power.times = tonumber(tokens[5])

                    if cardInfo.powers[tokens[2]] == nil then
                         cardInfo.powers[tokens[2]] = {}
                    end

                    local newCodes = {}
                    for i=2, #power.codes do
                         newCodes[#newCodes + 1] = power.codes[i]
                    end

                    local name = power.codes[1]
                    power.codes = newCodes

                    cardInfo.powers[tokens[2]][name] = power
               -- vp flags
               elseif code == "V" then
                    local tokens = split(line,":")
                    local vpFlags = {}
                    vpFlags.value = tonumber(tokens[2])
                    vpFlags.type = tokens[3]
                    vpFlags.name = tokens[4]

                    if cardInfo.vpFlags == nil then
                         cardInfo.vpFlags = {}
                    end

                    cardInfo.vpFlags[#cardInfo.vpFlags + 1] = vpFlags
               end
          end

          ::endloop::
     end

     return tbl
end

-- ======================
-- Helper functions
-- ======================

function magiclines(s)
        if s:sub(-1)~="\n" then s=s.."\n" end
        return s:gmatch("(.-)\n")
end

function all_trim(s)
   return s:gsub('%s+', '')
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

function shuffle(tbl)
     for i = #tbl, 2, -1 do
          local j = math.random(i)
          tbl[i], tbl[j] = tbl[j], tbl[i]
     end
     return tbl
end

function split(str, delimiter)
     local fields = {}

     local sep = delimiter or " "
     local pattern = string.format("([^%s]+)", delimiter)
     string.gsub(str, pattern, function(c) fields[#fields + 1] = c end)

     return fields
end

function getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     local results = {}
     local players = getSeatedPlayers()

     for i=1, #players do
          if Player[players[i]].seated and Player[players[i]].getHandCount() > 0 then
               results[#results + 1] = players[i]
          end
     end
     return results
end

-- ======================
-- Game specific helper functions
-- ======================

function highlightOn(card, color, player)
     card.UI.setXml('<Panel color="' .. color .. '" width="220" height="314" visibility="' .. player .. '"/>')
end

function highlightOff(card)
     card.UI.setXml('')
end

-- countMarked = whether or not to include face-down cards in the count (default is true)
function countCardsInHand(player, countMarked)
     if countMarked == nil then
          countMarked = true
     end

     local objs = Player[player].getHandObjects(1)

     if countMarked then
          return #objs
     else
          local n = 0

          for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
               if not obj.hasTag("Discard") and not obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
                    n = n + 1
               end
          end

          return n
     end
end

function setHelpTextAll(text)
     for player, _ in pairs(playerColorIndexMap) do
          setHelpText(player, text)
     end
end

function setHelpText(player, text)
     local i = playerColorIndexMap[player]
     local obj = getObjectFromGUID(helpDisplay_GUID[i])
     if obj then
          obj.UI.setValue("label", text)
     end
end

function checkIfSelectedPhase(player)
     local index = playerColorIndexMap[player]
     local zone = getObjectFromGUID(selectedActionZone_GUID[index])

     for _, obj in pairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
               return true
          end
     end

     return false
end

function discardMarkedCards()
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     local markedCards = {}

     for _, player in pairs(players) do
          for _, obj in pairs(Player[player].getHandObjects(1)) do
               if obj.type == 'Card' and (obj.hasTag("Discard") or obj.is_face_down) then
                    markedCards[#markedCards + 1] = obj
               end
          end
     end

     local discardEmpty = true
     for _, obj in pairs(discardZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' or obj.type == 'Deck' then
               discardEmpty = false
               break
          end
     end

     if discardEmpty and #markedCards > 0 then
          highlightOff(markedCards[1])
          markedCards[1].removeTag("Discard")
          markedCards[1].setPosition(discardZone.getPosition())
          markedCards[1].setRotation({0, 0, 180})
     end

     wait(0.05)

     local startIndex = 1
     for _, obj in pairs(discardZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' then
               if discardEmpty then
                    startIndex = 2
               end
          end

          if obj.type == 'Card' or obj.type == 'Deck' then
               for i=startIndex, #markedCards do
                    highlightOff(markedCards[i])
                    markedCards[i].removeTag("Discard")
                    obj = obj.putObject(markedCards[i])
               end
               return
          end
     end
end

-- check zone for any 'Selected' cards and attempt to play them
function attemptPlayCard(card, player)
     if type(card) == "table" then
          player = card[2]
          card = card[1]
     end

     local tableau = getObjectFromGUID(tableau_GUID[playerColorIndexMap[player]])
     local sp = tableau.getSnapPoints()

     -- Find first empty spot on tableau
     for i=1, #sp do
          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = tableau.positionToWorld({sp[i].position[1], sp[i].position[2] + 1, sp[i].position[3]}),
               direction = {0, -1, 0},
               max_direction = 2
          })

          -- found empty spot
          if hits[1].hit_object == tableau then
               -- trigger certain power bonuses based on phase
               if currentPhase > 0 and currentPhase <= #selectedPhases then
                    local phase = selectedPhases[currentPhase]
                    local powers = phasePowerSnapshot[player]
                    if powers["DRAW_AFTER"] then
                         dealTo(powers["DRAW_AFTER"], player)
                    end
               end

               local pos = tableau.positionToWorld(sp[i].position)
               local rot = tableau.getRotation()
               card.setPosition({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.02, pos[3]})
               card.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 0})
               card.removeTag("Selected")
               highlightOff(card)

               -- if windfall, place a goods on top
               if cardData[card.getName()].flags["WINDFALL"] then
                    placeGoodsAt(card.positionToWorld(goodsSnapPointOffset), rot[2])
               end

               return
          end
     end
end

function placeGoodsAt(position, yRotation)
     local card = drawCard()

     if card then
          card.setPositionSmooth({position[1], position[2] + 1.5, position[3]})
          card.setRotationSmooth({0, yRotation, 180})
     else
          -- shouldn't ever happen, but just in case
          broadcastToAll("No cards detected in draw or discard pile", "Red")
     end
end

function reshuffleDiscardPile()
     -- no deck or card found, reshuffle discard and return that
     item = getDeckOrCardInZone(discardZone)
     if item then
          broadcastToAll("Reshuffling the discard pile.", "White")
          item.setRotationSmooth({0,180,180})
          item.setPositionSmooth(drawZone.getPosition())
          item.shuffle()
     end

     return item
end

function getDeckOrCardInZone(zone)
     for _, obj in pairs(zone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Deck' or obj.type == 'Card' then
               return obj
          end
     end

     return nil
end

function drawCard()
     local card = nil
     if drawDeck == nil then
          drawDeck = getDeckOrCardInZone(drawZone)
          if not drawDeck then
               drawDeck = reshuffleDiscardPile()
          end
     end

     if drawDeck.type == 'Deck' then
          card = drawDeck.takeObject()

          if drawDeck.remainder then
               drawDeck = drawDeck.remainder
          end
     elseif drawDeck.type == 'Card' then
          card = drawDeck
          drawDeck = reshuffleDiscardPile()
     end

     drawDeck_GUID = drawDeck.getGUID()

     return card
end

function dealTo(n, player)
     for i=1, n do
          drawCard().deal(1, player)
     end
end

function createSelectButtonOnCard(card)
     card.clearButtons()
     card.createButton({
          click_function = "cardSelectClick",
          function_owner = self,
          position = {0, 0.5, 0},
          width = 600,
          height = 1000,
          font_size = 150,
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
          tooltip = 'Select "' .. card.getName() .. '"'
     })
end

function createCancelButtonOnCard(card)
     card.clearButtons()
     card.createButton({
          click_function = "cardCancelClick",
          function_owner = self,
          position = {0, 0.5, 0},
          width = 600,
          height = 1000,
          font_size = 150,
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
          tooltip = 'Cancel "' .. card.getName() .. '"'
     })
end

-- iterator to go through all face-up cards in tableau plus the selection action card(s)
function allCardsInTableau(player)
     local pi = playerColorIndexMap[player]
     local objs = getObjectFromGUID(tableauZone_GUID[pi]).getObjects()
     local actionCards = getObjectFromGUID(selectedActionZone_GUID[pi]).getObjects()

     for _, item in pairs(actionCards) do
          if item.hasTag("Action Card") then
               objs[#objs + 1] = item
          end
     end

     local i = 0

     return function()
               i = i + 1

               while objs[i] and (objs[i].type ~= 'Card' or objs[i].is_face_down) do
                    i = i + 1
               end

               return objs[i]
          end
end

-- ======================
-- Event functions
-- ======================

function onObjectRotate(object, spin, flip, player_color, old_spin, old_flip)
     if object.hasTag("Action Card") then
          return
     end

     local playerIndex = playerColorIndexMap[player_color]
     local inHandZone = false

     local zones = object.getZones()
     for i=1, #zones do
          if handZoneMap[zones[i].getGUID()] then
               inHandZone = true
               break
          end
     end

     if inHandZone and (flip == 180 or flip == 0) and not object.hasTag("Selected") then
          if flip == 180 then
               object.addTag("Discard")
          elseif flip == 0 then
               object.removeTag("Discard")
          end

          updateHelpText(player_color)
     end

     -- check to see if the object is in the player's hand zone to prevent mark for deletion
     if object.hasTag("Selected") and inHandZone and flip == 180 then
          local rot = object.getRotation()
          object.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 0})
          return
     end
end

function onObjectLeaveZone(zone, leave_object)
     if leave_object.isDestroyed() then
          return
     end

     local isHandZone = handZoneMap[zone.getGUID()]
     local isTableauZone = tableauZoneMap[zone.getGUID()]

     if isHandZone then
          if leave_object.hasTag("Selected") then
               highlightOff(leave_object)
          end

          leave_object.removeTag("Discard")
          leave_object.clearButtons()
          updateHelpText(handZoneOwner[zone.getGUID()])
     elseif isTableauZone then
          if leave_object.type == 'Card' then
               leave_object.setSnapPoints({})

               if leave_object.hasTag("Explore Highlight") == false then
                    leave_object.highlightOff()
                    highlightOff(leave_object)
               end

               if leave_object.getScale()[1] < 1 then
                    leave_object.setScale({1, 1, 1})
               end

               updateHelpText(tableauZoneOwner[zone.getGUID()])
          end
     end
end

function onObjectEnterZone(zone, enter_object)
     if enter_object.isDestroyed() then
          return
     end

     local isHandZone = handZoneMap[zone.getGUID()]
     local isTableauZone = tableauZoneMap[zone.getGUID()]

     if isHandZone then
          if enter_object.hasTag("Explore Highlight") then
               enter_object.removeTag("Explore Highlight")
          end
          if enter_object.hasTag("Selected") then
               highlightOn(enter_object, "rgb(0,1,0)", handZoneOwner[zone.getGUID()])
          end

          if enter_object.is_face_down then
               enter_object.addTag("Discard")
          end

          updateHandCardState(handZoneOwner[zone.getGUID()])
          updateHelpText(handZoneOwner[zone.getGUID()])
     elseif isTableauZone and enter_object.type == 'Card' then
          if enter_object.is_face_down then
               -- Check to see if card is below it to decide if this card is a goods card
               local hits = Physics.cast({
                    origin = enter_object.getPosition(),
                    direction = {0, -1, 0},
                    max_distance = 2
               })

               for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
                    local o = hit.hit_object
                    if o.type == 'Card' and not o.is_face_down then
                         local data = cardData[o.getName()]
                         if data and data.goods then
                              enter_object.setScale({0.6, 1, 0.6})
                              enter_object.highlightOn(goodsHighlightColor[data.goods])
                         end
                    end
               end
          -- face up card, check if need to place snap point for goods placement
          else
               local data = cardData[enter_object.getName()]
               if data and data.goods then
                    enter_object.setSnapPoints({{
                         position = goodsSnapPointOffset,
                         rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                         rotation_snap = true
                    }})
               end
          end

          updateHelpText(tableauZoneOwner[zone.getGUID()])
     end
end

-- ======================
-- Game functions
-- ======================

function gameStart()
     gameStarted = true
     currentPhase = -1

     for _, data in pairs(phaseTilePlacement) do
          local tile = componentsBag.takeObject({
               guid = data[1],
               position = data[2],
               rotation = {0, 180, 180},
               smooth = false
          })

          tile.setLock(true)
          tile.interactable = false
     end

     broadcastToAll("Determine your starting hand.", "White")
end

function playerReadyClicked(player)
     local i = playerColorIndexMap[player]

     -- perform some necessary checks first
     if currentPhase == -1 then
     elseif currentPhase == 0 and not checkIfSelectedPhase(player) then
          broadcastToColor("You must select an action card!", player, "White")
          getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[i]).call("setToggleState", false)
          getObjectFromGUID(smallReadyTokens_GUID[i]).call("setToggleState", false)
          return
     end

     startLuaCoroutine(Global, "checkAllReadyCo")
end

-- Makes all the ready buttons belonging to player the same toggle state
-- [1] = owner, [2] = state
function updateReadyButtons(params)
     local ind = playerColorIndexMap[params[1]]
     local btn1 = getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[ind])
     btn1.call("setToggleState", params[2])
     local btn2 = getObjectFromGUID(smallReadyTokens_GUID[ind])
     btn2.call("setToggleState", params[2])
end

function checkAllReadyCo()
     -- Check if all players are ready to move on to next step of game
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

     for i=1, #players do
          local readyToken = getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[playerColorIndexMap[players[i]]])
          if readyToken.getVar("isReady") == false then
               return 1
          end
     end

     setHelpTextAll("")

     -- play selected cards in hand
     for i=1, #players do
          for _, obj in pairs(Player[players[i]].getHandObjects(1)) do
               if obj.type == 'Card' and obj.hasTag("Selected") then
                    attemptPlayCard(obj, players[i])
               end
          end

          playerChoiceState[i] = nil
     end

     discardMarkedCards()

     wait(0.1)

     for i=1, #readyTokens_GUID do
          local token = getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[i])
          if token then
               token.call("setToggleState", false)
          end
     end

     for i=1, #smallReadyTokens_GUID do
          local token = getObjectFromGUID(smallReadyTokens_GUID[i])
          if token then
               token.call("setToggleState", false)
          end
     end

     if gameStarted and currentPhase == -1 then
          currentPhase = 0
          for i=1, #players do
               local menu = getObjectFromGUID(actionSelectorMenu_GUID[playerColorIndexMap[players[i]]])
               menu.call("rearrangeActionCards")
          end

          startNewRound()
          return 1
     end

     if currentPhase == 0 then
          local phases = {}

          -- flip over all selected phase cards and phase tiles
          for _, guid in pairs(selectedActionZone_GUID) do
               local zone = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
               for _, obj in pairs(zone.getObjects()) do
                    if obj.hasTag("Action Card") and obj.is_face_down then
                         obj.flip()
                         phases[split(obj.getName(), " ")[1]] = true
                    end
               end
          end

          for phase, _ in pairs(phases) do
               local index = phaseIndex[phase]
               local tile = getObjectFromGUID(phaseTilePlacement[index][1])
               tile.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 0})
               selectedPhases[#selectedPhases + 1] = phaseIndex[phase]
          end

          table.sort(selectedPhases)

          currentPhase = -1000

          wait(1.2)

          startLuaCoroutine(self, "beginNextPhase")
          return 1
     elseif currentPhase >= 1 then
          setHelpTextAll("")
          if currentPhase > #selectedPhases then
               -- round end check

          else
               startLuaCoroutine(self, "beginNextPhase")
          end
     end
     return 1
end

function startNewRound()
     currentPhase = 0
     selectedPhases = {}
     resetPhaseTiles()

     broadcastToAll("Starting new round.", "White")
     updateHelpTextAll()

     startLuaCoroutine(self, "returnActionCardsCo")
end

function returnActionCardsCo()
     for i=1, 4 do
          local o = getObjectFromGUID(actionSelectorMenu_GUID[i])
          o.call("returnSelectedActionCard")
     end

     wait(0.05)

     for i=1, 4 do
          local o = getObjectFromGUID(actionSelectorMenu_GUID[i])
          o.call("rearrangeActionCards")
     end

     return 1
end

function beginNextPhase()
     -- This shouldn't happen at all, but if it did...
     if not selectedPhases or #selectedPhases <= 0  then
          broadcastToAll("Error: No phases selected.", "Red")
          startNewRound()
          return 1
     end

     if currentPhase <= 0 then
          currentPhase = 0
     end

     currentPhase = currentPhase + 1

     -- Remove highlights if they exists
     for _, guid in pairs(handZone_GUID) do
          local zone = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
          for _, obj in pairs(zone.getObjects()) do
               highlightOff(obj)
          end
     end

     updatePhaseTilesHighlight()

     if currentPhase <= #selectedPhases then
          local phase = selectedPhases[currentPhase]
          broadcastToAll(phaseText[phase], "White")

          if phase == 1 then
               startExplorePhase()
          elseif phase == 2 then
               startDevelopPhase()
          elseif phase == 3 then
               startSettlePhase()
          elseif phase == 4 then
               startConsumePhase()
          elseif phase == 5 then
               startProducePhase()
          end
     else
          -- end of round
          startNewRound()
     end

     return 1
end

function updatePhaseTilesHighlight()
     phaseTilesHighlightOff()

     if currentPhase <= #selectedPhases and currentPhase > 0 then
          local phase = selectedPhases[currentPhase]

          -- hilight current phase tile
          local tile = getObjectFromGUID(phaseTilePlacement[phase][1])
          tile.UI.setXml('<Panel color="rgb(0.8,0.2,1)" width="240" height="240" position="0 0 0"></Panel>')
     end
end

function phaseTilesHighlightOff()
     for i=1, #phaseTilePlacement do
          local tile = getObjectFromGUID(phaseTilePlacement[i][1])
          if tile then
               tile.UI.setXml("")
          end
     end
end

function resetPhaseTiles()
     for i=1, #phaseTilePlacement do
          local tile = getObjectFromGUID(phaseTilePlacement[i][1])
          tile.setRotationSmooth({0, 180, 180})
     end
end

function startExplorePhase()
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

     for _, player in pairs(players) do
          local i = playerColorIndexMap[player]

          powersSnapshot(player, "1")

          if not phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"] then
               phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"] = 2
          else
               phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"] = phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"] + 2
          end

          if not phasePowerSnapshot[player]["KEEP"] then
               phasePowerSnapshot[player]["KEEP"] = 1
          else
               phasePowerSnapshot[player]["KEEP"] = phasePowerSnapshot[player]["KEEP"] + 1
          end

          handCountSnapshot[i] = countCardsInHand(player) + phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"]

          for j=1, phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"] do
               local card = drawCard()
               card.deal(1, player)
               card.addTag("Explore Highlight")
               highlightOn(card, "Orange", player)
          end

          updateHelpText(player)
     end
end

function startDevelopPhase()
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

     for player, i in pairs(playerColorIndexMap) do
          powersSnapshot(player, "2")

          if phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"] then
               dealTo(phasePowerSnapshot[player]["DRAW"], player)
          end

          updateHandCardState(player)
          updateHelpText(player)
     end
end

function startSettlePhase()
     local players = getSeatedPlayersWithHands()

     for player, i in pairs(playerColorIndexMap) do
          powersSnapshot(player, "3")

          updateHandCardState(player)
          updateHelpText(player)
     end
end

function startConsumePhase()
end

function startProducePhase()
end

-- player: tableau of player to check, phase: phase as a string
function powersSnapshot(player, phase)
     local values = {}
     local selectedItem = getObjectFromGUID(playerChoiceState[playerColorIndexMap[player]])

     for card in allCardsInTableau(player) do
          local info = cardData[card.getName()]

          if not info and card.hasTag("Action Card") then
               info = actionCardPowers[card.getName()]
          end

          if info.powers[phase] then
               local powers = info.powers[phase]
               for code, power in pairs(powers) do
                    if not values[code] then
                         values[code] = 0
                    end

                    -- count certain powers only in specific cases
                    if phase == "3" then
                         if powers["EXTRA_MILITARY"] then
                              local powerCodes = powers["EXTRA_MILITARY"].codes

                              if powerCodes[1] == "AGAINST_REBEL" and (selectedItem and cardData[selectedItem.getName()].flags["REBEL"]) or
                                 selectedItem and powerCodes[1] == cardData[selectedItem.getName()].goods then
                                   -- match
                              elseif #powerCodes > 0 then
                                   goto skip_add
                              end
                         end
                         if powers["REDUCE"] then
                              local powerCodes = powers["REDUCE"].codes

                              if selectedItem and powerCodes[1] == cardData[selectedItem.getName()].goods then
                                   -- match
                              elseif #powerCodes > 0 then
                                   goto skip_add
                              end
                         end
                    end

                    values[code] = values[code] + power.strength

                    ::skip_add::
               end
          end
     end

     phasePowerSnapshot[player] = values
end

function updateHandCardState(player)
     local index = playerColorIndexMap[player]

     if currentPhase >= 1 and currentPhase <= #selectedPhases then
          local phase = selectedPhases[currentPhase]
          for _, obj in pairs(Player[player].getHandObjects(1)) do
               obj.clearButtons()

               local info = cardData[obj.getName()]

               if (phase == 2 and info and info.type == 2) or
                  (phase == 3 and info and info.type == 1) then
                    if playerChoiceState[index] == nil then
                         createSelectButtonOnCard(obj)
                    elseif playerChoiceState[index] == obj.getGUID() then
                         createCancelButtonOnCard(obj)
                    end
               end
          end
     end

     for _, obj in pairs(Player[player].getHandObjects(1)) do
          if obj.hasTag("Selected") then
               highlightOn(obj, "rgb(0,1,0,1)", player)
          end
     end
end

function cardSelectClick(object, player, button)
     if button then
          return
     end

     local i = playerColorIndexMap[player]
     playerChoiceState[i] = object.getGUID()

     object.addTag("Selected")

     handCountSnapshot[i] = countCardsInHand(player, true)

     powersSnapshot(player, tostring(selectedPhases[currentPhase]))

     updateHandCardState(player)
     updateHelpText(player)
end

function cardCancelClick(object, player, button)
     if button then
          return
     end

     local i = playerColorIndexMap[player]
     playerChoiceState[i] = nil
     object.removeTag("Selected")
     highlightOff(object)

     updateHandCardState(player)
     updateHelpText(player)
end

function updateHelpTextAll()
     for color, i in pairs(playerColorIndexMap) do
          updateHelpText(color)
     end
end

function updateHelpText(player)
     local i = playerColorIndexMap[player]
     local values = phasePowerSnapshot[player]
     local cardsInHand = countCardsInHand(player, false)

     -- opening hand
     if gameStarted and currentPhase == -1 then
          setHelpText(player, "Determine starting hand.")
     -- end of round
     elseif currentPhase > #selectedPhases then
     -- start of round
     elseif currentPhase == 0 then
          setHelpText(player, "▲ Select an action card.")
     -- explore
     elseif selectedPhases[currentPhase] == 1 then
          local discardTarget = math.max(0, values["DRAW"] - values["KEEP"])
          local discarded = handCountSnapshot[i] - cardsInHand

          setHelpText(player, "Explore: draw " .. values["DRAW"] .. ", keep " .. values["KEEP"] .. ". (discard " .. discarded .. "/" .. discardTarget .. ")")
     elseif selectedPhases[currentPhase] == 2 then
          if playerChoiceState[i] then
               local card = getObjectFromGUID(playerChoiceState[i])
               local info = cardData[card.getName()]
               local discardTarget = math.max(0, info.cost - (values["REDUCE"] or 0))
               local discarded = handCountSnapshot[i] - cardsInHand
               setHelpText(player, "Develop: cost " .. discardTarget .. ". (discard " .. discarded .. "/" .. discardTarget .. ")")
          else
               setHelpText(player, "▼ Develop: may select a development.")
          end
     elseif selectedPhases[currentPhase] == 3 then
          if playerChoiceState[i] then
               local card = getObjectFromGUID(playerChoiceState[i])
               local info = cardData[card.getName()]

               if info.flags["MILITARY"] then
                    setHelpText(player, "Settle: " .. info.cost .. " defense. (Military " .. phasePowerSnapshot[player]["EXTRA_MILITARY"] .. "/" .. info.cost .. ")")
               else
                    local discardTarget = math.max(0, info.cost - (values["REDUCE"] or 0))
                    local discarded = handCountSnapshot[i] - cardsInHand
                    setHelpText(player, "Settle: cost " .. discardTarget .. ". (discard " .. discarded .. "/" .. discardTarget .. ")")
               end
          else
               setHelpText(player, "▼ Settle: may select a world.")
          end
     end
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
tableHeightOffset = -9

function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({tid=tableImageData, cd=checkData})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         tableImageData = loaded_data.tid
         checkData = loaded_data.cd
    else
        tableImageData = {}
        checkData = {move=false, scale=false}
    end

    --Disables interactable status of objects with GUID in list
    for _, guid in ipairs(ref_noninteractable) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj then obj.interactable = false end
    end

    --Establish references to table parts
    obj_leg1 = getObjectFromGUID("afc863")
    obj_leg2 = getObjectFromGUID("c8edca")
    obj_leg3 = getObjectFromGUID("393bf7")
    obj_leg4 = getObjectFromGUID("12c65e")
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    obj_side_top = getObjectFromGUID("35b95f")
    obj_side_bot = getObjectFromGUID("f938a2")
    obj_side_lef = getObjectFromGUID("9f95fd")
    obj_side_rig = getObjectFromGUID("5af8f2")

    controlActive = false
    --self.interactable = false
    createOpenCloseButton()
end



--Activation/deactivation of control panel



--Activated by clicking on
function click_toggleControl(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        if not controlActive then
            --Activate control panel
            controlActive = true
            self.clearButtons()
            createOpenCloseButton()
            createSurfaceInput()
            createSurfaceButtons()
            createScaleInput()
            createScaleButtons()
        else
            --Deactivate control panel
            controlActive = false
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createOpenCloseButton()

        end
    end
end




--Table surface control



--Changes table surface
function click_applySurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("New Table Image Applied", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Saves table surface
function click_saveSurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local nickname = self.getInputs()[1].value
        local url = self.getInputs()[2].value
        if nickname == "" then
            --No nickname
            broadcastToAll("Please supply a nickname for this save.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
        else
            --Nickname exists

            if findInImageDataIndex(url, nickname) == nil then
                --Save doesn't exist already
                table.insert(tableImageData, {url=url, name=nickname})
                broadcastToAll("Image URL saved to memory.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
                --Refresh buttons
                self.clearButtons()
                createOpenCloseButton()
                createSurfaceButtons()
                createScaleButtons()
            else
                --Save exists already
                broadcastToAll("Memory already contains a save with this Name or URL. Delete it first.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            end
        end
    end
end

--Loads table surface
function click_loadMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        self.editInput({index=0, value=tableImageData[index].name})
        self.editInput({index=1, value=tableImageData[index].url})
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("Table Image Loaded", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Deletes table surface
function click_deleteMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        table.remove(tableImageData, index)
        self.clearButtons()
        createOpenCloseButton()
        createSurfaceButtons()
        createScaleButtons()
        broadcastToAll("Element Removed from Memory", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Updates surface from the values in the input field
function updateSurface()
    local customInfo = obj_surface.getCustomObject()
    customInfo.diffuse = self.getInputs()[2].value
    obj_surface.setCustomObject(customInfo)
    obj_surface = obj_surface.reload()
end



--Table Scale control



--Applies Scale to table pieces
function click_applyScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local newWidth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[3].value)
        local newDepth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[4].value)
        if type(newWidth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Width", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif type(newDepth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Depth", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth<0.1 or newDepth<0.1 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale cannot go below 0.1", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth>12 or newDepth>12 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale should not go over 12 (world size limitation)", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        else
            changeTableScale(math.abs(newWidth), math.abs(newDepth))
            broadcastToAll("Scale applied.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks move box for hands
function click_checkMove(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkMove" end
        if checkData.move == true then
            checkData.move = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.move = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks scale box for hands
--This button was disabled for technical reasons
--[[
function click_checkScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkScale" end
        if checkData.scale == true then
            checkData.scale = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.scale = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end
]]

--Alters scale of elements and moves them
function changeTableScale(width, depth)
    --Scaling factors used to translate scale to position offset
    local width2pos = (width-1) * 18
    local depth2pos = (depth-1) * 18

    --Hand zone movement
    if checkData.move == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                moveHandZone(Player[pc], width2pos, depth2pos)
            end
        end
    end
    --Hand zone scaling
    --The button to enable this was disabled for technical reasons
    if checkData.scale == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                scaleHandZone(Player[pc], width, depth)
            end
        end
    end

    --Resizing table elements
    obj_side_top.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_bot.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_lef.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_side_rig.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_surface.setScale({width, 1, depth})

    --Moving table elements to accomodate new scale
    obj_side_lef.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_rig.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_top.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_side_bot.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg1.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg2.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg3.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg4.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    self.setPosition(obj_leg4.positionToWorld({-22.12, 8.74,-19.16}))
    --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
    --obj_surface.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,0})
end

--Move hand zone, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function moveHandZone(p, width2pos, depth2pos)
    local widthX = obj_side_rig.getPosition().x
    local depthZ = obj_side_top.getPosition().z
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local pos = handT.position
        local y = handT.rotation.y

        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            if pos.z > 0 then
                pos.z = pos.z + depth2pos - depthZ
            else
                pos.z = pos.z - depth2pos + depthZ
            end
        else
            if pos.x > 0 then
                pos.x = pos.x + width2pos - widthX
            else
                pos.x = pos.x - width2pos + widthX
            end
        end

        --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
        --pos.y = tableHeightOffset + 14

        handT.position = pos
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end


---Scales hand zones, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function scaleHandZone(p, width, depth)
    local widthFact = width / obj_side_top.getScale().x
    local depthFact = depth / obj_side_lef.getScale().x
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local scale = handT.scale
        local y = handT.rotation.y
        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            scale.x = scale.x * widthFact
        else
            scale.x = scale.x * depthFact
        end
        handT.scale = scale
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end



--Information gathering



--Checks if a color is promoted or host
function permissionCheck(color)
    if Player[color].host==true or Player[color].promoted==true then
        return true
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Locates a string saved within memory file
function findInImageDataIndex(...)
    for _, str in ipairs({...}) do
        for i, v in ipairs(tableImageData) do
            if v.url == str or v.name == str then
                return i
            end
        end
    end
    return nil
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

--Locates a button with a helper function
function findButton(obj, func)
    if func==nil then error("No func supplied to findButton") end
    for _, v in ipairs(obj.getButtons()) do
        if func(v) then
            return v
        end
    end
    return nil
end



--Creation of buttons/inputs



function createOpenCloseButton()
    local tooltip = "Open Table Control Panel"
    if controlActive then
        tooltip = "Close Table Control Panel"
    end
    self.createButton({
        click_function="click_toggleControl", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0,0}, rotation={-45,0,0}, height=400, width=400,
        color={1,1,1,0}, tooltip=tooltip
    })
end

function createSurfaceInput()
    local currentURL = obj_surface.getCustomObject().diffuse
    local nickname = ""
    if findInImageDataIndex(currentURL) ~= nil then
        nickname = tableImageData[findInImageDataIndex(currentURL)].name
    end
    self.createInput({
        label="Nickname", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,2}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter nickname for table image (only used for save)",
        value=nickname
    })
    self.createInput({
        label="URL", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,3}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter URL for tabletop image",
        value=currentURL
    })
end

function createSurfaceButtons()
    --Label
    self.createButton({
        label="Tabletop Surface Image", click_function="none",
        position={0,0,1}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Functional
    self.createButton({
        label="Apply Image\nTo Table", click_function="click_applySurface",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Apply URL as table image",
        position={2,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Save Image\nTo Memory", click_function="click_saveSurface",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Record URL into memory (requires nickname)",
        position={-2,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
    --Label
    self.createButton({
        label="Load From Memory", click_function="none",
        position={0,0,5.5}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Saves, created dynamically from memory file
    for i, memoryEntry in ipairs(tableImageData) do
        --Load
        local funcName = i.."loadMemory"
        local func = function(x,y) click_loadMemory(x,y,i) end
        self.setVar(funcName, func)
        self.createButton({
            label=memoryEntry.name, click_function=funcName,
            function_owner=self, tooltip=memoryEntry.url, font_size=200,
            position={-0.6,0,6.5+0.5*(i-1)}, height=240, width=3300,
        })
        --Delete
        local funcName = i.."deleteMemory"
        local func = function(x,y) click_deleteMemory(x,y,i) end
        self.setVar(funcName, func)
        self.createButton({
            label="DELETE", click_function=funcName,
            function_owner=self, tooltip="",
            position={3.6,0,6.5+0.5*(i-1)}, height=240, width=600,
            font_size=160, font_color={1,0,0}, color={0.8,0.8,0.8}
        })
    end
end

function createScaleInput()
    self.createInput({
        label=string.char(8644), input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={-8.5,0,2}, height=224, width=400,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Table Width",
        value=round(obj_side_top.getScale().x, 1)
    })
    self.createInput({
        label=string.char(8645), input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={-7.5,0,2}, height=224, width=400,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Table Depth",
        value=round(obj_side_lef.getScale().x, 1)
    })
end

function createScaleButtons()
    --Labels
    self.createButton({
        label="Table Scale", click_function="none",
        position={-8,0,1}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label=string.char(8644).."            "..string.char(8645),
        click_function="none",
        position={-8,0,2}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Move Hands:", click_function="none",
        position={-8.3,0,3}, height=0, width=0, font_size=200, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Disabled due to me removing the feature for technical reasons
    --[[
    self.createButton({
        label="Scale Hands:", click_function="none",
        position={-8.3,0,4}, height=0, width=0, font_size=200, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ]]
    --Checkboxes
    local label = ""
    if checkData.move == true then label = string.char(10008) end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_checkMove",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Check to move hands when table is rescaled",
        position={-6.8,0,3}, height=224, width=224, font_size=200,
    })
    --[[
    local label = ""
    if checkData.scale == true then label = string.char(10008) end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_checkScale",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Check to scale the width of hands when table is rescaled",
        position={-6.8,0,4}, height=224, width=224, font_size=200,
    })
    ]]
    --Apply button
    self.createButton({
        label="Apply Scale", click_function="click_applyScale",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Apply width/depth to table",
        position={-8,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
end

end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
isReady = false

function onSave()
    local saved_data = {}
    saved_data.isReady = isReady
    return JSON.encode(saved_data)
end

function onload(saved_data)
     if saved_data ~= "" then
          local data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
          isReady = data.isReady
     end

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "toggleState",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 800,
          height = 800,
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0)
     })

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "toggleState",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 800,
          height = 800,
          rotation = {0, 0, 180},
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0)
     })
end

function toggleState(obj, _, rightClick)
     if rightClick or Global.getVar("gameStarted") == false then
          return
     end

     isReady = not isReady
     Global.call("updateReadyButtons", {player, isReady})

     if isReady then
          Global.call("playerReadyClicked", player)
     end
end

function setToggleState(ready)
     local rot = self.getRotation()
     isReady = ready

     if isReady then
          self.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 0})
     else
          self.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 180})
     end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
player = "Yellow"

actionTable_GUID = "63866b"
selectedActionCardTile_GUID = "082406"
selectedActionCardZone_GUID = "d507c0"

targetActionCardName = ""

function onload()
     actionZone = self.getZones()[1]
     phaseTable = getObjectFromGUID(actionTable_GUID)
     selectedActionCardTile = getObjectFromGUID(selectedActionCardTile_GUID)
     selectedActionCardZone = getObjectFromGUID(selectedActionCardZone_GUID)

     createButtons()
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

function createButtons()
     local tooltips = {
          "I: Explore (+5)",
          "I: Explore (+1,+1)",
          "II: Develop",
          "III: Settle",
          "IV: Consume ($)",
          "IV: Consume (2x)",
          "V: Produce"
     }

     local clickFunc = {
          "explore5Click",
          "explore11Click",
          "developClick",
          "settleClick",
          "consumeTradeClick",
          "consumex2Click",
          "produceClick"
     }

     for i=1, #tooltips do
          self.createButton({
               click_function = clickFunc[i],
               function_owner = self,
               width = 600,
               height = 600,
               font_size = 120,
               position = {-5.73 + (i-1) * 1.905, 0.11, 0},
               color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
               tooltip = tooltips[i]
          })
     end
end

function explore5Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Explore (+5)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function explore11Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Explore (+1,+1)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function developClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Develop"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function settleClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Settle"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function consumeTradeClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Consume ($)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function consumex2Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Consume (x2)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function produceClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Produce"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function selectPhaseCo()
     if Global.getVar("gameStarted") == false or Global.getVar("currentPhase") ~= 0 then
          return 1
     end

     local targetName = targetActionCardName

     returnSelectedActionCard()

     wait(0.05)

     rearrangeActionCards()

     local sp = selectedActionCardTile.getSnapPoints()
     local rot = self.getRotation()

     local objs = actionZone.getObjects()

     for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
          if obj.type == "Card" and obj.getName() == targetName then
               local pos = selectedActionCardTile.positionToWorld(sp[1].position)

               obj.setPosition({pos[1], pos[2] + 1, pos[3]})
               obj.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 180})

               broadcastToColor("Selected " .. targetName .. ".", player, "White")
               return 1
          end
     end

     return 1
end

function returnSelectedActionCard()
     local objs = selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()

     for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
          if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
               obj.setPosition(actionZone.getPosition())
          end
     end
end

function rearrangeActionCards()
     local spStartIndex = 2

     local phaseCardNames = Global.getVar("phaseCardNames")
     local phaseCardSpIndex = {}

     for i=1, #phaseCardNames do
          phaseCardSpIndex[phaseCardNames[i]] = spStartIndex + (i-1)
     end

     local sp = phaseTable.getSnapPoints()

     for _, obj in pairs(actionZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == "Deck" then
               local n = #obj.getObjects()
               for i=1, n do
                    local card = obj.takeObject()
                    local spIndex = phaseCardSpIndex[card.getName()]
                    placeCardAtSnapPoint(card, phaseTable, sp[spIndex], false)
               end
          elseif obj.type == "Card" then
               local spIndex = phaseCardSpIndex[obj.getName()]
               placeCardAtSnapPoint(obj, phaseTable, sp[spIndex], false)
          end
     end
end

function placeCardAtSnapPoint(card, spOwner, sp, faceDown)
     local rot = spOwner.getRotation()

     for i=1, 3 do
          rot[i] = rot[i] + sp.rotation[i]
     end

     if faceDown then
          rot[3] = 180
     end

     local pos = spOwner.positionToWorld(sp.position)
     card.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.1, pos[3]})
     card.setRotationSmooth(rot)
end

targetActionCardName = ""

function onload()
     actionZone = self.getZones()[1]
     phaseTable = getObjectFromGUID(actionTable_GUID)
     selectedActionCardTile = getObjectFromGUID(selectedActionCardTile_GUID)
     selectedActionCardZone = getObjectFromGUID(selectedActionCardZone_GUID)

     createButtons()
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

function createButtons()
     local tooltips = {
          "I: Explore (+5)",
          "I: Explore (+1,+1)",
          "II: Develop",
          "III: Settle",
          "IV: Consume ($)",
          "IV: Consume (2x)",
          "V: Produce"
     }

     local clickFunc = {
          "explore5Click",
          "explore11Click",
          "developClick",
          "settleClick",
          "consumeTradeClick",
          "consumex2Click",
          "produceClick"
     }

     for i=1, #tooltips do
          self.createButton({
               click_function = clickFunc[i],
               function_owner = self,
               width = 600,
               height = 600,
               font_size = 120,
               position = {-5.73 + (i-1) * 1.905, 0.11, 0},
               color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
               tooltip = tooltips[i]
          })
     end
end

function explore5Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Explore (+5)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function explore11Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Explore (+1,+1)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function developClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Develop"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function settleClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Settle"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function consumeTradeClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Consume ($)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function consumex2Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Consume (x2)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function produceClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Produce"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function selectPhaseCo()
     if Global.getVar("gameStarted") == false or Global.getVar("currentPhase") ~= 0 then
          return 1
     end

     local targetName = targetActionCardName

     returnSelectedActionCard()

     wait(0.05)

     rearrangeActionCards()

     local sp = selectedActionCardTile.getSnapPoints()
     local rot = self.getRotation()

     local objs = actionZone.getObjects()

     for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
          if obj.type == "Card" and obj.getName() == targetName then
               local pos = selectedActionCardTile.positionToWorld(sp[1].position)

               obj.setPosition({pos[1], pos[2] + 1, pos[3]})
               obj.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 180})

               broadcastToColor("Selected " .. targetName .. ".", player, "White")
               return 1
          end
     end

     return 1
end

function returnSelectedActionCard()
     local objs = selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()

     for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
          if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
               obj.setPosition(actionZone.getPosition())
          end
     end
end

function rearrangeActionCards()
     local spStartIndex = 2

     local phaseCardNames = Global.getVar("phaseCardNames")
     local phaseCardSpIndex = {}

     for i=1, #phaseCardNames do
          phaseCardSpIndex[phaseCardNames[i]] = spStartIndex + (i-1)
     end

     local sp = phaseTable.getSnapPoints()

     for _, obj in pairs(actionZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == "Deck" then
               local n = #obj.getObjects()
               for i=1, n do
                    local card = obj.takeObject()
                    local spIndex = phaseCardSpIndex[card.getName()]
                    placeCardAtSnapPoint(card, phaseTable, sp[spIndex], false)
               end
          elseif obj.type == "Card" then
               local spIndex = phaseCardSpIndex[obj.getName()]
               placeCardAtSnapPoint(obj, phaseTable, sp[spIndex], false)
          end
     end
end

function placeCardAtSnapPoint(card, spOwner, sp, faceDown)
     local rot = spOwner.getRotation()

     for i=1, 3 do
          rot[i] = rot[i] + sp.rotation[i]
     end

     if faceDown then
          rot[3] = 180
     end

     local pos = spOwner.positionToWorld(sp.position)
     card.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.1, pos[3]})
     card.setRotationSmooth(rot)
end

vpPoolBag_GUID = "c2e459"
vpTokensBag_GUID = "5719f7"
mainDeck_GUID = "12aefa"
drawMat_GUID = "021362"

vpPoolBagPlacement = {0.00, 1.40, 4.49}
vpTokensBagPlacement = {3.75, 1.46, 3.75}
drawMatPlacement = {0.00, 1.48, 0.00}
mainDeckPlacement = {-1.75, 4.13, -0.02}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = {}
    --saved_data.active = self.UI.getAttribute("menu", "active")
    return JSON.encode(saved_data)
end

--Loads save, creates buttons and identifies key entities
function onload(saved_data)
     -- if saved_data ~= "" then
     --      local data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
     --      self.UI.setAttribute("menu", "active", data.active)
     -- end

     --self.interactable = false
     mainBag = getObjectFromGUID("4c1650")
end

function startGameClick()
     self.setPosition({0, -1, 0})
     self.UI.setAttribute("menu", "active", "false")
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "setupCo")

     --self.destruct()
end

function setupCo()
     local registeredColors = {"Yellow", "Red", "Blue", "Green"}
     local players = Global.call("getSeatedPlayersWithHands")
     local playerCount = math.max(2, #players)

     broadcastToAll("Setting up for a " .. playerCount .. " player game.", "White")

     -- removed unused objects by players
     local registeredPlayers = {}
     for _, player in pairs(players) do
          registeredPlayers[player] = 1
     end

     local unregisteredPlayers = {}
     for _, color in pairs(registeredColors) do
          if not registeredPlayers[color] then
               unregisteredPlayers[#unregisteredPlayers + 1] = color
          end
     end

     local playerIndex = Global.getVar("playerColorIndexMap")
     local readyTokens_GUID = Global.getVar("readyTokens_GUID")
     local smallReadyTokens_GUID = Global.getVar("smallReadyTokens_GUID")

     for _, player in pairs(unregisteredPlayers) do
          local i = playerIndex[player]
          getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[i]).destruct()
          getObjectFromGUID(smallReadyTokens_GUID[i]).destruct()
     end

     local drawMat = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = drawMat_GUID,
          position = drawMatPlacement,
          rotation = {0, 180, 0},
          smooth = false
     })
     drawMat.interactable = false
     drawMat.setLock(true)

     local vpPoolBag = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = vpPoolBag_GUID,
          position = vpPoolBagPlacement,
          smooth = false
     })

     local vpTokensBag = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = vpTokensBag_GUID,
          position = vpTokensBagPlacement,
          smooth = false
     })

     vpPoolBag.setLock(true)
     vpTokensBag.setLock(true)

     local vpPoolBagPos = vpPoolBag.getPosition()
     for i=1, playerCount * 12 do
          vpPoolBag.putObject(vpTokensBag.takeObject())
     end

     -- place Deck
     local deck = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = mainDeck_GUID,
          position = mainDeckPlacement,
          rotation = {0, 180, 180},
          smooth = false
     })

     wait(1)

     -- search cards for start worlds
     local cardData = Global.getVar("cardData")
     local startWorlds_GUID = {}
     for _, card in pairs(deck.getObjects()) do
          if cardData[card.name] == nil then
               print("'" .. card.name .. "' not found in card lookup table.", "Red")
          elseif cardData[card.name].flags["START"] then
               startWorlds_GUID[#startWorlds_GUID + 1] = card.guid
          end
     end

     startWorlds_GUID = Global.call("shuffle", startWorlds_GUID)

     for i=1, #players do
          local card = deck.takeObject({guid = startWorlds_GUID[i]})
          card.deal(1, players[i])
          Global.call("attemptPlayCard", {card, players[i]})
          --card.highlightOn("Yellow")
          --card.addTag("Selected")
     end
     -- local redStartWorlds_GUID = {}
     -- local blueStartWorlds_GUID = {}
     --
     -- for _, card in pairs(deck.getObjects()) do
     --      if cardData[card.name] == nil then
     --           print("'" .. card.name .. "' not found in card lookup table.", "Red")
     --      elseif cardData[card.name].flags["START"] then
     --           if cardData[card.name].flags["START_RED"] then
     --                redStartWorlds_GUID[#redStartWorlds_GUID + 1] = card.guid
     --           elseif cardData[card.name].flags["START_BLUE"] then
     --                blueStartWorlds_GUID[#blueStartWorlds_GUID + 1] = card.guid
     --           end
     --      end
     -- end
     --
     -- redStartWorlds_GUID = Global.call("shuffle", redStartWorlds_GUID)
     -- blueStartWorlds_GUID = Global.call("shuffle", blueStartWorlds_GUID)
     --
     -- for i=1, #players do
     --      local card = deck.takeObject({guid = redStartWorlds_GUID[i]})
     --      card.deal(1, players[i])
     --      card = deck.takeObject({guid = blueStartWorlds_GUID[i]})
     --      card.deal(1, players[i])
     -- end

     deck.shuffle()

     for i=1, #players do
          deck.deal(6, players[i])
     end

     Global.call("gameStart")

     return 1
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

isReady = false

function onSave()
    local saved_data = {}
    saved_data.isReady = isReady
    return JSON.encode(saved_data)
end

function onload(saved_data)
     if saved_data ~= "" then
          local data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
          isReady = data.isReady
     end

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "toggleState",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 800,
          height = 800,
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0)
     })

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "toggleState",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 800,
          height = 800,
          rotation = {0, 0, 180},
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0)
     })
end

function toggleState(obj, _, rightClick)
     if rightClick or Global.getVar("gameStarted") == false then
          return
     end

     isReady = not isReady
     Global.call("updateReadyButtons", {player, isReady})

     if isReady then
          Global.call("playerReadyClicked", player)
     end
end

function setToggleState(ready)
     local rot = self.getRotation()
     isReady = ready

     if isReady then
          self.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 0})
     else
          self.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 180})
     end
end
